issue.title: www.twitch.tv

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### ATTENTION

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you're using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you're using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.twitch.tv](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv) ### Comment > 애드가드가 작동 중일 때, 팔로우 중인 스트리머의 방송은 무한로딩 됩니다. 하지만 제가 팔로우 중이지 않은 스트리머의 방송을 보면 방송이 정상적으로 나옵니다. When AdGuard is running, the broadcasts of streamers I'm following are loaded infinitely. However, when I watch a streamer's broadcast that I don't follow, the broadcast appears normally. (translated by google translate) ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/2t0YyQN.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/atoJpmJ.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.9.1 Browser: | Chrome AdGuard driver: | WFP Stealth mode options: | Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Block WebRTC DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Language-specific:
List-KR,
Dandelion Sprout's Nordic Filters,
AdGuard French,
AdGuard Russian,
AdGuard Japanese,
AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese Userscripts: | https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js,
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js

issue.body:
### ATTENTION

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you're using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you're using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)
